# Allows you to create your own dynamic keys
# to be called in localization.
# defined_text -> this is it, we're defining the text
# text -> a discrete entry that can be picked to display in loc.
# trigger -> determines if a text entry will be picked or not.
# (The triggers need to be valid for the scope the key is called in
# (eg Root or From.From).)
# localization_key -> points to the localization key
# that'll be used if trigger passes

###############
### General ###
###############

defined_text = {
	name = missile_ships_loc
	text = { localization_key = missile_ships_loc_key }
}

defined_text = {
	name = missile_defense_ships_loc
	text = { localization_key = missile_defense_ships_loc_key }
}

defined_text = {
	name = SLBM_subs_loc
	text = { localization_key = SLBM_subs_loc_key }
}

defined_text = {
	name = SLCM_subs_loc
	text = { localization_key = SLCM_subs_loc_key }
}

defined_text = {
	name = missile_ships_desc_loc
	text = { trigger = { NOT = { has_dlc = "Man the Guns" } }
		localization_key = missile_ships_no_DLC
	}
	text = { trigger = { has_dlc = "Man the Guns" }
		localization_key = missile_ships_MTG
	}
}

defined_text = {
	name = missile_defense_ships_desc_loc
	text = { trigger = { NOT = { has_dlc = "Man the Guns" } }
		localization_key = missile_defense_ships_no_DLC
	}
	text = { trigger = { has_dlc = "Man the Guns" }
		localization_key = missile_defense_ships_MTG
	}
}

defined_text = {
	name = SLBM_subs_desc_loc
	text = { trigger = { NOT = { has_dlc = "Man the Guns" } }
		localization_key = SLBM_subs_no_DLC
	}
	text = { trigger = { has_dlc = "Man the Guns" }
		localization_key = SLBM_subs_MTG
	}
}

defined_text = {
	name = SLCM_subs_desc_loc
	text = { trigger = { NOT = { has_dlc = "Man the Guns" } }
		localization_key = SLCM_subs_no_DLC
	}
	text = { trigger = { has_dlc = "Man the Guns" }
		localization_key = SLCM_subs_MTG
	}
}


defined_text = {
	name = NSAM_FLEET_RATIO_missile_ships
	text = { trigger = { NOT = { has_dlc = "Man the Guns" } }
		localization_key = NSAM_FLEET_RATIO_missile_ships_loc
	}
	text = { trigger = { has_dlc = "Man the Guns" }
		localization_key = NSAM_FLEET_RATIO_missile_ships_mtg_loc
	}
}

######################
### production gui ###
######################

### missile_production_gui.xlsx sheet 'scripted loc gen-unique code'
defined_text = {
	name = missile_type_prod_1_selected_loc
	text = {
		trigger = {
			unique_missile_model_names = yes
		}
		localization_key = missile_type_prod_1_selected_unique_loc
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			NOT = { unique_missile_model_names = yes }
		}
		localization_key = missile_type_prod_1_selected_generic_loc
	}
}

defined_text = {
	name = missile_type_prod_1_selected_unique_loc
	text = {
		trigger = {
			original_tag = USA
		}
		localization_key = missile_type_prod_1_selected_USA_loc
	}
	text = {

	name = global_prod_7_array_window_loc
	text = {
		trigger = {
			NOT = { unique_missile_model_names = yes }
			check_variable = { prod_7_display_array^i = 71 }
		}
		localization_key = missile_generic_ID_71_loc_key
	}
	text = {

			original_tag = USA
			check_variable = { prod_7_display_array^i = 71 }

	name = global_prod_10_array_window_loc

defined_text = {
	name = target_tooltip_loc
	text = {
		trigger = {
			MD_missiles_target_button_distance_trigger = yes
		}
		localization_key = target_tooltip_loc_yes
	}
	text = {
		localization_key = target_tooltip_loc_no
	}
}

####################
### sub triggers ###
####################

defined_text = {
	name = NOT_has_launch_point_selected_loc
	text = {
		trigger = {
			ROOT = { NOT = { has_country_flag = search_target_point } }
		}
		localization_key = NOT_has_launch_point_selected_loc_yes
	}
	text = {
		localization_key = NOT_has_launch_point_selected_loc_no
	}
}

defined_text = {
	name = has_launch_point_selected_loc
	text = {
		trigger = {
			ROOT = { has_country_flag = search_target_point }
		}
		localization_key = has_launch_point_selected_loc_yes
	}
	text = {
		localization_key = has_launch_point_selected_loc_no
	}
}

defined_text = {
	name = NOT_has_target_point_selected_loc
	text = {
		trigger = {
			ROOT = { NOT = { has_country_flag = has_trajectory } }
		}
		localization_key = NOT_has_target_point_selected_loc_yes
	}
	text = {
		localization_key = NOT_has_target_point_selected_loc_no
	}
}

### target point ###

defined_text = {
	name = target_point_in_range_loc
	text = {
		trigger = {
			meta_trigger = {
				text = {
					distance_to = {
						value < [range]
						target = [launch_point_ID]
					}
				}
				launch_point_ID = "[?ROOT.missile_launch_point_array^var_missile_trajectory_ID.GetID]"
				range = "[?ROOT.var_range]"
			}
		}
		localization_key = target_point_in_range_loc_yes
	}
	text = {
		localization_key = target_point_in_range_loc_no
	}
}


### ground_launched ###

defined_text = {
	name = ground_launched_missile_trigger_loc
	text = {
		trigger = {
			ROOT = {
				set_temp_variable = { temp1 = PREV.building_level@missile_silo }
				set_temp_variable = { temp2 = PREV.building_level@internet_station } ### replace with TEL base }
				multiply_temp_variable = { temp1 = var_silo_launcher }
				multiply_temp_variable = { temp2 = var_TEL_launcher }
				add_to_temp_variable = { temp1 = 1 }
				add_to_temp_variable = { temp2 = 1 }
				OR = {
					### ICBM ###
					AND = {
						has_selected_ICBM = yes
						check_variable = { temp1 > var_gui_salvo }
					}
					### IRBM ###
					AND = {
						has_selected_IRBM = yes
						check_variable = { temp2 > var_gui_salvo }
					}
					### GLCM ###
					AND = {
						has_selected_GLCM = yes
						OR = {
							check_variable = { temp1 > var_gui_salvo }
							check_variable = { temp2 > var_gui_salvo }
						}
					}
					### HSCM ###
					AND = {
						has_selected_HSCM = yes
						OR = {
							check_variable = { temp1 > var_gui_salvo }
							check_variable = { temp2 > var_gui_salvo }
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		localization_key = ground_launched_missile_trigger_loc_yes
	}
	text = {
		localization_key = ground_launched_missile_trigger_loc_no
	}
}

defined_text = {
	name = ICBM_launch_trigger_loc
	text = {
		trigger = {
			ROOT = {
				set_temp_variable = { temp1 = PREV.building_level@missile_silo }
				multiply_temp_variable = { temp1 = var_silo_launcher }
				set_temp_variable = { temp_loc = temp1 }
				add_to_temp_variable = { temp1 = 1 }
				check_variable = { temp1 > var_gui_salvo }
				has_selected_ICBM = yes
			}
		}
		localization_key = ICBM_launch_trigger_loc_yes
	}
	text = {
		localization_key = ICBM_launch_trigger_loc_no
	}
}

defined_text = {
	name = IRBM_launch_trigger_loc
	text = {
		trigger = {
			ROOT = {
				set_temp_variable = { temp2 = PREV.building_level@internet_station } ### replace with TEL base }
				multiply_temp_variable = { temp2 = var_TEL_launcher }
				add_to_temp_variable = { temp2 = 1 }
				check_variable = { temp2 > var_gui_salvo }
				has_selected_IRBM = yes
			}
		}
		localization_key = IRBM_launch_trigger_loc_yes
	}
	text = {
		localization_key = IRBM_launch_trigger_loc_no
	}
}

defined_text = {
	name = GLCM_launch_trigger_loc
	text = {
		trigger = {
			ROOT = {
				set_temp_variable = { temp1 = PREV.building_level@missile_silo }
				set_temp_variable = { temp2 = PREV.building_level@internet_station } ### replace with TEL base }
				multiply_temp_variable = { temp1 = var_silo_launcher }
				multiply_temp_variable = { temp2 = var_TEL_launcher }
				add_to_temp_variable = { temp1 = 1 }
				add_to_temp_variable = { temp2 = 1 }
				OR = {
					check_variable = { temp1 > var_gui_salvo }
					check_variable = { temp2 > var_gui_salvo }
				}
				has_selected_GLCM = yes
			}
		}
		localization_key = GLCM_launch_trigger_loc_yes
	}
	text = {
		localization_key = GLCM_launch_trigger_loc_no
	}
}

defined_text = {
	name = HSCM_ground_launch_trigger_loc
	text = {
		trigger = {
			ROOT = {
				set_temp_variable = { temp1 = PREV.building_level@missile_silo }
				set_temp_variable = { temp2 = PREV.building_level@internet_station } ### replace with TEL base }
				multiply_temp_variable = { temp1 = var_silo_launcher }
				multiply_temp_variable = { temp2 = var_TEL_launcher }
				add_to_temp_variable = { temp1 = 1 }
				add_to_temp_variable = { temp2 = 1 }
				OR = {
					check_variable = { temp1 > var_gui_salvo }
					check_variable = { temp2 > var_gui_salvo }
				}
				has_selected_HSCM = yes
			}
		}
		localization_key = HSCM_ground_launch_trigger_loc_yes
	}
	text = {
		localization_key = HSCM_ground_launch_trigger_loc_no
	}

### sea_launched ###

defined_text = {
	name = sea_launched_missile_trigger_loc
	text = {
		trigger = {
			meta_trigger = {
				text = {
					ROOT = {
						OR = {
							### SLBM ###
							AND = {
								[sea_launch_point] = {
									has_state_flag = sea_launch_point
								}
								has_selected_SLBM = yes
								sea_launch_point_sub_[sea_launch_point] = yes
							}
							### SLCM ###
							AND = {
								[sea_launch_point] = {
									has_state_flag = sea_launch_point
								}
								has_selected_SLCM = yes
								OR = {
									sea_launch_point_[sea_launch_point] = yes
									sea_launch_point_sub_[sea_launch_point] = yes
								}
							}
							### HSCM ### trigger for SLCM mod to add
							AND = {
								[sea_launch_point] = {
									has_state_flag = sea_launch_point
								}
								has_selected_HSCM = yes
								OR = {
									sea_launch_point_[sea_launch_point] = yes
									sea_launch_point_sub_[sea_launch_point] = yes
								}
							}
						}
					}
					#ROOT = { NOT = { has_country_flag = search_target_point } }
				}
				sea_launch_point = "[PREV.GetID]"
			}
		}
		localization_key = sea_launched_missile_trigger_loc_yes
	}
	text = {
		localization_key = sea_launched_missile_trigger_loc_no
	}
}

defined_text = {
	name = SLBM_launch_trigger_loc
	text = {
		trigger = {
			meta_trigger = {
				text = {
					ROOT = {
						### SLBM ###

							[sea_launch_point] = {
								has_state_flag = sea_launch_point
							}
							has_selected_SLBM = yes
							sea_launch_point_sub_[sea_launch_point] = yes
						}
					}
				}
				sea_launch_point = "[PREV.GetID]"
			}
		}
		localization_key = SLBM_launch_trigger_loc_yes
	}
	text = {
		localization_key = SLBM_launch_trigger_loc_no
	}
}

### air base ###

defined_text = {
	name = has_air_base_ALCM_loc
	text = {
		trigger = {
			THIS = { air_base > 0 }
		}
		localization_key = has_air_base_ALCM_loc_yes
	}
	text = {
		localization_key = has_air_base_ALCM_loc_no
	}
}

### CV ###

defined_text = {
	name = has_CV_ALCM_loc
	text = {
		trigger = {
			meta_trigger = {
				text = {
					ROOT = {
						[sea_launch_point] = {
							has_state_flag = sea_launch_point
						}
					}
					ROOT = { sea_launch_point_CV_[sea_launch_point] = yes }
				}
				sea_launch_point = "[PREV.GetID]"
			}
		}
		localization_key = has_CV_ALCM_loc_yes
	}
	text = {
		localization_key = has_CV_ALCM_loc_no
	}
}


### selected missile ###

defined_text = {
	name = has_selected_ICBM_loc
	text = {
		trigger = {
			has_selected_ICBM = yes
		}
		localization_key = has_selected_ICBM_loc_yes
	}
	text = {
		localization_key = has_selected_ICBM_loc_no
	}
}

### enough launcher ###

defined_text = {
	name = has_enough_ground_launcher_loc
	text = {
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				has_selected_ICBM = yes
				has_selected_IRBM = yes
				has_selected_GLCM = yes
				has_selected_HSCM = yes
			}
		}
		localization_key = has_enough_ground_launcher_loc_yes
	}
	text = {
		localization_key = has_enough_ground_launcher_loc_no
	}
}

defined_text = {
	name = nuclear_warhead_name_win_loc
	text = {
		trigger = {
			check_variable = { nuclear_warhead_display_array^i = 0 }
		}
		localization_key = nuclear_warhead_generic_ID_0_loc_key

#####################
### WARHEAD COSTS ###
#####################

defined_text = {
	name = conventional_warhead_costs_loc
	text = {
		trigger = {
			set_temp_variable = { temp_CW_costs = global.conventional_warhead_cost_array^i }
			set_temp_variable = { temp_CW_decoy = global.conventional_warhead_cost_array^i }
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { var_win_MIRV > 0 }
				}
				multiply_temp_variable = { temp_CW_costs = var_win_MIRV }
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { var_win_decoy > 0 }
				}
				multiply_temp_variable = { temp_CW_decoy = var_win_decoy }
				multiply_temp_variable = { temp_CW_decoy = 0.5 }
				add_to_temp_variable = { temp_CW_costs = temp_CW_decoy }
			}
		}
		localization_key = conventional_warhead_costs_loc_key
	}
}

defined_text = {
	name = nuclear_warhead_costs_loc
	text = {
		trigger = {
			set_temp_variable = { temp_NW_costs = global.nuclear_warhead_cost_array^i }
			set_temp_variable = { temp_NW_decoy = global.nuclear_warhead_cost_array^i }
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { var_win_MIRV > 0 }
				}
				multiply_temp_variable = { temp_NW_costs = var_win_MIRV }
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { var_win_decoy > 0 }
				}
				multiply_temp_variable = { temp_NW_decoy = var_win_decoy }
				multiply_temp_variable = { temp_NW_decoy = 0.5 }
				add_to_temp_variable = { temp_NW_costs = temp_NW_decoy }
			}
		}
		localization_key = nuclear_warhead_costs_loc_key
	}
}

### WARHEADS ###

# WARHEAD_NAME_SELECTED

defined_text = {
	name = warhead_selected_loc
	text = {
		trigger = {
			#check_variable = { var_gui_warhead = 0 }
			NOT = { has_country_flag = has_warhead }
		}
		localization_key = warhead_selected_0_loc_key
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			check_variable = { var_gui_nuke = 1 }
		}
		localization_key = warhead_selected_1_loc_key # conventional_warhead_name_gui_loc
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			check_variable = { var_gui_nuke = 2 }
		}
		localization_key = warhead_selected_2_loc_key # nuclear_warhead_name_gui_loc
	}
}

# WARHEAD_NAME_STAT

defined_text = {
	name = warhead_stat_loc
	text = {
		trigger = {
			check_variable = { missile_nuke_array^var_stat_trajectory_ID = 1 } ### to do
		}
		localization_key = warhead_stat_1_loc_key # conventional_warhead_name_gui_loc
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			check_variable = { missile_nuke_array^var_stat_trajectory_ID = 2 } ### to do
		}
		localization_key = warhead_stat_2_loc_key # nuclear_warhead_name_gui_loc
	}
}


################################################
### launch gui selected_TAG controller flags ###
################################################

defined_text = {
	name = temp_launch_point_ID_loc
	text = {
		trigger = {
			var:ROOT.selected_TAG_missile_launch_point_array^i = {
				controller = {
					set_temp_variable = { temp_launch_point_ID = THIS.id }
					log = "temp_launch_point_ID_loc temp var [?temp_launch_point_ID]"
				}
			}
		}
		localization_key = temp_launch_point_ID_loc_key
	}
}

defined_text = {
	name = temp_target_point_ID_loc
	text = {
		trigger = {
			var:ROOT.selected_TAG_missile_target_point_array^i = {
				controller = {
					set_temp_variable = { temp_target_point_ID = THIS.id }
					log = "temp_target_point_ID_loc temp var [?temp_target_point_ID]"
				}
			}
		}
		localization_key = temp_target_point_ID_loc_key
	}
}

			check_variable = { ROOT.selected_TAG_missile_type_array^i = 72 }
		}
		localization_key = missile_ENG_ID_72_loc_key
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			check_variable = { missile_launch_selected_TAG = FRA.id }
			check_variable = { ROOT.selected_TAG_missile_type_array^i = 72 }

	name = missile_type_tech_loc

		trigger = {
			unique_missile_model_names = yes
		}
		localization_key = missile_type_tech_unique_loc
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			NOT = { unique_missile_model_names = yes }
		}
		localization_key = missile_type_tech_generic_loc
	}
}

			unique_missile_model_names = yes
		}

	}

		trigger = {
			NOT = { unique_missile_model_names = yes }
		}
		localization_key = missile_type_stat_generic_loc
	}

	name = missile_type_stat_SOV_loc
	text = {
		trigger = {
			check_variable = { missile_type_array^var_stat_trajectory_ID = 0 }
		}

	}

		trigger = {
			original_tag = SOV

		}
		localization_key = missile_SOV_ID_11_loc_key
	}

	name = ABM_name_loc
	text = {
		trigger = {
			NOT = { unique_missile_model_names = yes }
			check_variable = { ABM_display_array^i = 90 }
		}
		localization_key = missile_generic_ID_90_loc_key
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			original_tag = USA
			check_variable = { ABM_display_array^i = 90 }
		}
		localization_key = missile_USA_ID_90_loc_key
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			original_tag = GER

defined_text = {
	name = sat_network_traffic_mil
	text = {
		trigger = {
			check_variable = { var_sat_network_traffic_mil > 1 }
		}
		localization_key = sat_network_traffic_mil_R
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			check_variable = { var_sat_network_traffic_mil < 1.01 }
		}
		localization_key = sat_network_traffic_mil_G
	}
}

defined_text = {
	name = sat_network_traffic_civ
	text = {
		trigger = {
			check_variable = { var_sat_network_traffic_civ > 1 }
		}
		localization_key = sat_network_traffic_civ_R
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			check_variable = { var_sat_network_traffic_civ < 1.01 }
		}
		localization_key = sat_network_traffic_civ_G
	}
}

### sat system entries level loc ### missile_tech.xlsx sheet 'sat_systems_scrpt loc win'

defined_text = {
	name = GNSS_mil_level
	text = {
		trigger = {
			check_variable = { GNSS_mil_systems_array^i = 0 }
		}
		localization_key = GNSS_mil_idx_0_loc
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			check_variable = { GNSS_mil_systems_array^i = 1 }
		}
		localization_key = GNSS_mil_idx_1_loc
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			check_variable = { GNSS_mil_systems_array^i = 2 }
		}
		localization_key = GNSS_mil_idx_2_loc
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			check_variable = { GNSS_mil_systems_array^i = 3 }
		}
		localization_key = GNSS_mil_idx_3_loc
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			check_variable = { GNSS_mil_systems_array^i = 4 }
		}
		localization_key = GNSS_mil_idx_4_loc
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			check_variable = { GNSS_mil_systems_array^i = 5 }
		}
		localization_key = GNSS_mil_idx_5_loc
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			check_variable = { GNSS_mil_systems_array^i = 6 }
		}
		localization_key = GNSS_mil_idx_6_loc
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			check_variable = { GNSS_mil_systems_array^i = 7 }
		}
		localization_key = GNSS_mil_idx_7_loc
	}
}

### satellite gui window trigger tooltips ###

defined_text = {
	name = GNSS_MIL_BUTTON_WINDOW_TT_loc
	text = {
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				check_variable = { GNSS_satellite_array^i > global.GNSS_sat_system_min_array^i }
				check_variable = { i = 0 }
			}
		}
		localization_key = GNSS_MIL_BUTTON_WINDOW_TT_yes
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				NOT = { check_variable = { GNSS_satellite_array^i > global.GNSS_sat_system_min_array^i } }
				NOT = { check_variable = { i = 0 } }
			}
		}
		localization_key = GNSS_MIL_BUTTON_WINDOW_TT_no
	}
}

	name = GNSS_CIV_BUTTON_WINDOW_TT_loc

### MD_satellite_orbit_view_gui ###

defined_text = {
	name = total_sat_num_loc
	text = {
		trigger = {
			var:orbit_selected_TAG = {
				set_temp_variable = { temp1 = var_GNSS_sat_total }
				add_to_temp_variable = { temp1 = var_COM_sat_total }
				add_to_temp_variable = { temp1 = var_SPY_sat_total }
				add_to_temp_variable = { temp1 = var_KILL_sat_total }
				add_to_temp_variable = { temp1 = var_RODS_sat_total }
			}
		}
		localization_key = "[?temp1]"
	}
}

##########################
### left container loc ###
##########################

### sat numbers selected TAG ###

#GNSS
defined_text = {
	name = GNSS_sat_total
	text = {
		trigger = {
			var:orbit_selected_TAG = {
				set_temp_variable = { temp_GNSS_total = var_GNSS_sat_total }
			}
		}
		localization_key = GNSS_sat_total_loc_key
	}
}

defined_text = {
	name = GNSS_SATELLITES_ORBIT_TT0_loc
	text = {
		trigger = {
			var:orbit_selected_TAG = {
				set_temp_variable = { temp_GNSS_0 = GNSS_satellite_array^0 }
			}
		}
		localization_key = GNSS_SATELLITES_ORBIT_TT0
	}
}

### sat types selected TAG ###  missile_production_gui.xlsx  sheet 'scptd loc sat orbit'

defined_text = {
	name = GNSS1_model_sat_orbit_loc
	text = {
		trigger = {
			NOT = { unique_missile_model_names_selected_TAG = yes }
		}
		localization_key = missile_generic_ID_111_loc_key
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			check_variable = { orbit_selected_TAG = USA.id }
		}
		localization_key = missile_USA_ID_111_loc_key
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			check_variable = { orbit_selected_TAG = GER.id }
		}
		localization_key = missile_GER_ID_111_loc_key
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			check_variable = { orbit_selected_TAG = SOV.id }
		}
		localization_key = missile_SOV_ID_111_loc_key
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			check_variable = { orbit_selected_TAG = CHI.id }
		}
		localization_key = missile_CHI_ID_111_loc_key
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			check_variable = { orbit_selected_TAG = ENG.id }
		}
		localization_key = missile_ENG_ID_111_loc_key
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			check_variable = { orbit_selected_TAG = FRA.id }
		}
		localization_key = missile_FRA_ID_111_loc_key
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			check_variable = { orbit_selected_TAG = ISR.id }
		}
		localization_key = missile_ISR_ID_111_loc_key
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			check_variable = { orbit_selected_TAG = RAJ.id }
		}
		localization_key = missile_RAJ_ID_111_loc_key
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			check_variable = { orbit_selected_TAG = PAK.id }
		}
		localization_key = missile_PAK_ID_111_loc_key
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			check_variable = { orbit_selected_TAG = NKO.id }
		}
		localization_key = missile_NKO_ID_111_loc_key
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			check_variable = { orbit_selected_TAG = PER.id }
		}
		localization_key = missile_PER_ID_111_loc_key
	}
}

defined_text = {
	name = TARGET_SAT_TAG_loc
	text = {
		trigger = {
				set_temp_variable = { temp_target_TAG = ROOT.sat_target_array^i }
		}
		localization_key = TARGET_SAT_ID_loc_key
	}
}

### sat types target TAG ###  missile_production_gui.xlsx  sheet 'scptd loc sat orbit target'

defined_text = {
	name = sat_1_type_icon
	text = {
		trigger = {
			var:orbit_selected_TAG = {
				set_temp_variable = { gfx_idx = sat_1_array^i }
				check_variable = { orbit_array^gfx_idx = 111 }
			}
		}
		localization_key = "GFX_GNSS_satellite_texticon"

### sat target icon ###

defined_text = {
	name = target_sat_type_icon_loc
	text = {
		trigger = {
			var:orbit_selected_TAG = {
				check_variable = { THIS.orbit_array^ROOT.sat_target_array^i > 110 }
				check_variable = { THIS.orbit_array^ROOT.sat_target_array^i < 119 }
			}
		}
		localization_key = GNSS_target_sat_type_icon_loc_key
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			var:orbit_selected_TAG = {
				check_variable = { THIS.orbit_array^ROOT.sat_target_array^i > 120 }
				check_variable = { THIS.orbit_array^ROOT.sat_target_array^i < 129 }
			}
		}
		localization_key = COM_target_sat_type_icon_loc_key
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			var:orbit_selected_TAG = {
				check_variable = { THIS.orbit_array^ROOT.sat_target_array^i > 130 }
				check_variable = { THIS.orbit_array^ROOT.sat_target_array^i < 139 }
			}
		}
		localization_key = SPY_target_sat_type_icon_loc_key
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			var:orbit_selected_TAG = {
				check_variable = { THIS.orbit_array^ROOT.sat_target_array^i > 140 }
				check_variable = { THIS.orbit_array^ROOT.sat_target_array^i < 147 }
			}
		}
		localization_key = KILL_target_sat_type_icon_loc_key
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			var:orbit_selected_TAG = {
				check_variable = { THIS.orbit_array^ROOT.sat_target_array^i > 150 }
				check_variable = { THIS.orbit_array^ROOT.sat_target_array^i < 154 }
			}
		}
		localization_key = RODS_target_sat_type_icon_loc_key
	}
}

	name = nuclear_status_selection_loc
	text = {
		trigger = {
			check_variable = { nuclear_status_display_array^i = 0 }
			add_to_temp_array = { array = checkbox_icon_1_frame value = 2 index = i }
			add_to_temp_array = { array = checkbox_icon_2_frame value = 1 index = i }
			add_to_temp_array = { array = checkbox_icon_3_frame value = 1 index = i }

defined_text = {
	name = nuclear_status_special_selection_loc
	text = { trigger = { check_variable = { nuclear_status_display_array^i = 0 } }
		localization_key = nuclear_status_0_special_loc_key
	}
	text = { trigger = { check_variable = { nuclear_status_display_array^i = 1 } }
		localization_key = nuclear_status_1_special_loc_key
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			check_variable = { nuclear_status_display_array^i = 2 }

		}
		localization_key = nuclear_status_2_special_loc_key
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			check_variable = { nuclear_status_display_array^i = 3 }

		}
		localization_key = nuclear_status_3_special_loc_key
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			check_variable = { nuclear_status_display_array^i = 4 }

		}
		localization_key = nuclear_status_4_special_loc_key
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			check_variable = { nuclear_status_display_array^i = 5 }

		}
		localization_key = nuclear_status_5_special_loc_key
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			check_variable = { nuclear_status_display_array^i = 6 }
		}
		localization_key = nuclear_status_6_special_loc_key
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			check_variable = { nuclear_status_display_array^i = 7 }

		}
		localization_key = nuclear_status_7_special_loc_key
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			check_variable = { nuclear_status_display_array^i = 8 }

		}
		localization_key = nuclear_status_8_special_loc_key
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			check_variable = { nuclear_status_display_array^i = 9 }

		}
		localization_key = nuclear_status_9_special_loc_key
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			check_variable = { nuclear_status_display_array^i = 10 }

		}
		localization_key = nuclear_status_10_special_loc_key
	}
	text = {

		}

	}

		}
		localization_key = nuclear_status_12_special_loc_key

			check_variable = { global.nuclear_warhead_tech_array^i = 12 }
		}
		localization_key = nuclear_warhead_generic_ID_12_loc_key
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			check_variable = { global.nuclear_warhead_tech_array^i = 13 }
		}
		localization_key = nuclear_warhead_generic_ID_13_loc_key
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			check_variable = { global.nuclear_warhead_tech_array^i = 14 }
		}
		localization_key = nuclear_warhead_generic_ID_14_loc_key
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			check_variable = { global.nuclear_warhead_tech_array^i = 15 }
		}
		localization_key = nuclear_warhead_generic_ID_15_loc_key
	}
}

#### NUCLEAR_WARHEAD_PROD_BUTTON_TRIGGER_TT

defined_text = {
	name = nuclear_warhead_prod_button_trigger_loc
	text = {
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				AND = {
					has_tech = nuclear_warhead_0
					check_variable = { i = 0 }
				}
				AND = {
					has_tech = nuclear_warhead_1
					check_variable = { i = 1 }
				}
				AND = {
					has_tech = nuclear_warhead_2
					check_variable = { i = 2 }
				}
				AND = {
					has_tech = nuclear_warhead_3
					check_variable = { i = 3 }
				}
				AND = {
					has_tech = nuclear_warhead_4
					check_variable = { i = 4 }
				}
				AND = {
					has_tech = nuclear_warhead_5
					check_variable = { i = 5 }
				}
				AND = {
					has_tech = nuclear_warhead_6
					check_variable = { i = 6 }
				}
				AND = {
					has_tech = nuclear_warhead_7
					check_variable = { i = 7 }
				}
				AND = {
					has_tech = nuclear_warhead_8
					check_variable = { i = 8 }
				}
				AND = {
					has_tech = nuclear_warhead_9
					check_variable = { i = 9 }
				}
				AND = {
					has_tech = nuclear_warhead_10
					check_variable = { i = 10 }
				}
				AND = {
					has_tech = nuclear_warhead_11
					check_variable = { i = 11 }
				}
				AND = {
					has_tech = nuclear_warhead_12
					check_variable = { i = 12 }
				}
				AND = {
					has_tech = nuclear_warhead_13
					check_variable = { i = 13 }
				}
				AND = {
					has_tech = nuclear_warhead_14
					check_variable = { i = 14 }
				}
				AND = {
					has_tech = nuclear_warhead_15
					check_variable = { i = 15 }
				}
			}
		}
		localization_key = NUCLEAR_WARHEAD_PROD_BUTTON_TRIGGER_YES_TT
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				OR = {
					AND = {
						has_tech = nuclear_warhead_0
						check_variable = { i = 0 }
					}
					AND = {
						has_tech = nuclear_warhead_1
						check_variable = { i = 1 }
					}
					AND = {
						has_tech = nuclear_warhead_2
						check_variable = { i = 2 }
					}
					AND = {
						has_tech = nuclear_warhead_3
						check_variable = { i = 3 }
					}
					AND = {
						has_tech = nuclear_warhead_4
						check_variable = { i = 4 }
					}
					AND = {
						has_tech = nuclear_warhead_5
						check_variable = { i = 5 }
					}
					AND = {
						has_tech = nuclear_warhead_6
						check_variable = { i = 6 }
					}
					AND = {
						has_tech = nuclear_warhead_7
						check_variable = { i = 7 }
					}
					AND = {
						has_tech = nuclear_warhead_8
						check_variable = { i = 8 }
					}
					AND = {
						has_tech = nuclear_warhead_9
						check_variable = { i = 9 }
					}
					AND = {
						has_tech = nuclear_warhead_10
						check_variable = { i = 10 }
					}
					AND = {
						has_tech = nuclear_warhead_11
						check_variable = { i = 11 }
					}
					AND = {
						has_tech = nuclear_warhead_12
						check_variable = { i = 12 }
					}
					AND = {
						has_tech = nuclear_warhead_13
						check_variable = { i = 13 }
					}
					AND = {
						has_tech = nuclear_warhead_14
						check_variable = { i = 14 }
					}
					AND = {
						has_tech = nuclear_warhead_15
						check_variable = { i = 15 }
					}
				}
			}
		}
		localization_key = NUCLEAR_WARHEAD_PROD_BUTTON_TRIGGER_NO_TT
	}
}

defined_text = {
	name = SAM_redeploy_loc
	text = {
		trigger = {
			set_temp_variable = { temp_SAM_redeploy = ROOT.var_SAM_redeploy }
			add_to_temp_variable = { temp_SAM_redeploy = ROOT.var_SAM_redeploy_week1 }
			add_to_temp_variable = { temp_SAM_redeploy = ROOT.var_SAM_redeploy_week2 }
		}
		localization_key = SAM_redeploy_loc_key
	}
}

	name = TEL_redeploy_loc

			add_to_temp_variable = { temp_TEL_redeploy = ROOT.var_TEL_redeploy_week2 }
		}
		localization_key = TEL_redeploy_loc_key
	}

	name = call_missile_localization_utility_loc

		trigger = { check_variable = { missile_type = 1 } }
		localization_key = call_missile_localization_utility_1_loc
	}
	text = {
		trigger = { check_variable = { missile_type = 2 } }
		localization_key = call_missile_localization_utility_2_loc
	}
	text = {
		trigger = { check_variable = { missile_type = 3 } }
		localization_key = call_missile_localization_utility_3_loc
	}
	text = {
		trigger = { check_variable = { missile_type = 4 } }
		localization_key = call_missile_localization_utility_4_loc
	}
	text = {
		trigger = { check_variable = { missile_type = 5 } }
		localization_key = call_missile_localization_utility_5_loc
	}
	text = {
		trigger = { check_variable = { missile_type = 6 } }
		localization_key = call_missile_localization_utility_6_loc
	}
	text = {
		trigger = { check_variable = { missile_type = 7 } }
		localization_key = call_missile_localization_utility_7_loc
	}
	text = {
		trigger = { check_variable = { missile_type = 8 } }
		localization_key = call_missile_localization_utility_8_loc
	}
	text = {
		trigger = { check_variable = { missile_type = 9 } }
		localization_key = call_missile_localization_utility_9_loc
	}
	text = {
		trigger = { check_variable = { missile_type = 10 } }
		localization_key = call_missile_localization_utility_10_loc
	}
	text = {
		trigger = { check_variable = { missile_type = 11 } }
		localization_key = call_missile_localization_utility_11_loc
	}
	text = {
		trigger = { check_variable = { missile_type = 12 } }
		localization_key = call_missile_localization_utility_12_loc
	}
	text = {
		trigger = { check_variable = { missile_type = 13 } }
		localization_key = call_missile_localization_utility_13_loc
	}
	text = {
		trigger = { check_variable = { missile_type = 14 } }
		localization_key = call_missile_localization_utility_14_loc
	}
	text = {
		trigger = { check_variable = { missile_type = 15 } }
		localization_key = call_missile_localization_utility_15_loc
	}
	text = {
		localization_key = "!!! WARNING NO MISSILE TYPE SET !!!"
	}
}
